title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-3.7 - Responsibilities of the parent or legal guardian
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-3.7 - Responsibilities of the parent or legal guardian

State Regulations

The parent or guardian of any child born to a woman with a positive HBsAg test result shall have administered to such child immunizing doses of hepatitis B immune globulin and hepatitis B vaccine at birth as well as follow-up doses of hepatitis B vaccine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
69-3.7

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
